en.validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
en.validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
en.validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, and dashes.
en.validation.alpha_num: The :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
en.validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.

between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.

en.validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
en.validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
en.validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
en.validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
en.validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.

max.numeric: The :attribute may not be greater than :max.
max.file: The :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.string: The :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.
max.array: The :attribute may not have more than :max items.

en.validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.

min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.

en.validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
en.validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
en.validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
en.validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
en.validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
